name: Hex Alchemy (by Vzadu na pozadí)
description: It is a 2d topdown action adventure game set in the Witch's hut. You, as a player will be playing as one of the two characters. However both characters will act as one entity. First player, playing as the cauldron is using his mobility to control movement and finish enemies by eating them. Second player, playing as the witch is shooting to knock enemies unconcious so the cauldron can eat them. The witch also crafts power ups from potions on the ground.
